questions.question: How do I create colors from RGB values?
questions.answer: Use `colorUtils.fromRGB(r, g, b, alpha)` with values from 0 to 1.

questions.question: How do I create colors from HEX values?
questions.answer: Use `colorUtils.fromHex("#RRGGBB")` or `colorUtils.fromHex("#RRGGBBAA")` for colors with alpha.

questions.question: How do I convert a color to HEX string?
questions.answer: Use `colorUtils.toHex(color)` to get HEX string with alpha included.

questions.question: How do I apply color to text?
questions.answer: Use `textNode.fullContent.applyCharacterStyles({ color }, range)` with a Color object.

questions.question: How do I apply fill color to shapes?
questions.answer: Use `shape.fill = editor.makeColorFill(color)` to apply solid color fills.

questions.question: How do I apply stroke color to shapes?
questions.answer: Use `shape.stroke = editor.makeStroke({ color, width })` to apply colored strokes.

questions.question: How do I show the native color picker?
questions.answer: Call `addOnUISdk.app.showColorPicker(anchorElement, options)` to display the picker.

questions.question: How do I handle color picker events?
questions.answer: Listen for `"colorpicker-color-change"` and `"colorpicker-close"` events on the anchor element.
